chart.name: chart.user.call.target.gauge
chart.title: Calls emitted target completed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.callEmittedNumber*100/self.callEmittedNumberTarget AS _callEmittedNumber FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.callEmittedNumberTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.user.call.target.bar
chart.title: Call emitted historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.callEmittedNumber) AS _callEmittedNumber, SUM(self.callEmittedNumberTarget) AS _callEmittedNumberTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.name: chart.user.meeting.target.gauge
chart.title: Meetings number target completed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.meetingNumber*100/self.meetingNumberTarget AS _meetingNumber FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.meetingNumberTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.user.meeting.target.bar
chart.title: Meetings number historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.meetingNumber) AS _meetingNumber, SUM(self.meetingNumberTarget) AS _meetingNumberTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.name: chart.user.opportunity.amount.won.target.gauge
chart.title: Opportunities amount won target completed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.opportunityAmountWon*100/self.opportunityAmountWonTarget AS _opportunityAmountWon FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.opportunityAmountWonTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.user.opportunity.amount.won.target.bar

chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.opportunityAmountWon) AS _opportunityAmountWon, SUM(self.opportunityAmountWonTarget) AS _opportunityAmountWonTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.name: chart.user.opportunity.created.number.target.bar
chart.title: Opportunities created number historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.opportunityCreatedNumber) AS _opportunityCreatedNumber, SUM(self.opportunityAmountEarnedTarget) AS _opportunityAmountEarnedTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.title: Opportunities created won target completed (%)

chart.name: chart.user.opportunity.amount.won.target.bar
chart.title: Opportunities created won historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.opportunityCreatedWon) AS _opportunityCreatedWon, SUM(self.opportunityCreatedWonTarget) AS _opportunityCreatedWonTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.userInfo.internalUser.id = :user GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate
